com.oracle.tools.runtime.coherence
Class ClusterMemberSchema

java.lang.Object
  com.oracle.tools.runtime.AbstractApplicationSchema<A,S>
      com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.AbstractJavaApplicationSchema<ClusterMember,ClusterMemberSchema>
          com.oracle.tools.runtime.coherence.ClusterMemberSchema
All Implemented Interfaces:
ApplicationSchema<ClusterMember,ClusterMemberSchema>, JavaApplicationSchema<ClusterMember,ClusterMemberSchema>
public class ClusterMemberSchema
extends AbstractJavaApplicationSchema<ClusterMember,ClusterMemberSchema>

A ClusterMemberSchema is a Coherence-based specific JavaApplicationSchema.

Copyright (c) 2010. All Rights Reserved. Oracle Corporation.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.

Brian Oliver
